message: Let's split fairly, I get a bit more
I think we should split more evenly, with a slight advantage for me to make up for the inflation. This is my counter-offer.
Considering inflation, my offer is more generous than before
Alice, the clock is ticking and inflation is eating our potential gains. This offer is fair considering the circumstances. Let's close the deal.
You're right, time is running out. I'll meet you halfway, but I still think I deserve a bit more
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this offer now, or the inflation will hurt us both. I'm offering you more than you'd get if we split evenly after the next round.
I know inflation is hurting your share, but I'm not budging much. This is my best offer so far
